entry.title: PUBG Creator Krafton Unveils 'Overdare' NFT Game With AI Creation Tools
entry.summary: Overdare looks to deliver a Roblox-like game creation experience within an open-world metaverse, built on top of the Settlus blockchain.

entry.title: One Year After the Merge: Where Does Ethereum Stand?
entry.summary: In terms of price, Ethereum is trading at approximately the same price it was when the merge happened in 2022. But that's just part of the story.

entry.title: Is Bitcoin Mining Really Greener? Here's What's Going On
entry.summary: A new report says Bitcoin mining is mostly sustainable, and that environmental FUD is "overstated."

entry.title: How to Use Yieldflow: the DeFi Protocol for Passive Growth of Digital Assets
entry.summary: While centralized exchanges expose customers to security risk in the event that they collapse, and to unpredictable liquidity, inflexible staking rules, and more, YieldFlow aims for a smooth user experience governed by trust, security, and decentralization.

entry.title: What Is Toncoin, the Cryptocurrency Conceived by Telegram?
entry.summary: TON uses a sharded, proof of stake consensus mechanism, meaning it can process transactions in parallel, improving transaction speed.

entry.title: Arnault Family LVMH Succession Saga: Will Pro-Crypto Sons Prevail?
entry.summary: Bernard Arnault is preparing to choose which child will inherit his $400 billion luxury empire. The decision could have major implications for crypto.

entry.title: What Are Wrapped Tokens? How They Work and What They’re Used For
entry.summary: Wrapped tokens such as WBTC help move assets across blockchains. Here’s why they matter to the crypto ecosystem.

entry.title: Sam Bankman-Fried: 'There’s Nothing I Can Do to Make My Lifetime Impact Net Positive'
entry.summary: In 250 pages of leaked writings about the collapse of FTX, its co-founder Sam Bankman-Fried laments that he feels "broke" and "hated."

entry.title: Celsius Exec Pleads Guilty, Agrees to Cooperate in Case Against CEO
entry.summary: Former chief revenue officer Roni Cohen-Pavon reached an agreement with the U.S. Attorney’s office along with his guilty plea.

entry.title: SEC Accuses Binance US of ‘Numerous Discovery Failures’ in Court Filing
entry.summary: The regulator claimed that the exchange had produced just 220 documents during discovery, including “unintelligible screenshots.”

entry.title: 'Cast It Into the Fire': GOP Moves to Advance Bills That Ban CBDC
entry.summary: Republicans argue a CBDC would undermine existing stablecoins, and usher Americans down a slippery slope toward mass government surveillance.

entry.title: AI Defense Startup Helsing Raises $223 Million to 'Protect Democracies'
entry.summary: With backing from Saab and General Catalyst, Helsing will focus on AI enhancements for the NATO Eurofighter and Future Combat Air System.

entry.title: SoftBank's Arm Stock Soars 25% as AI Chip Designer's IPO Nets $65 Billion Valuation
entry.summary: Apparently fueled by AI hype, semiconductor technology company Arm Holdings had a sensational Nasdaq return on Thursday.

entry.title: Christie's Turns Keith Haring Digital Art Into NFC-Equipped Patch
entry.summary: MNTGE and the auction house transformed one of Keith Haring's works—currently on sale as an NFT—into a patch with its own proof of ownership.

entry.title: Gods Unchained's Daniel Paez on the Future of NFT Gaming Interoperability
entry.summary: Daniel Paez, executive producer on NFT card-battling game Gods Unchained, speaks with Decrypt Culture Editor Andrew Hayward about what the future of NFT game interoperability will really look like—and what it won't.

entry.title: LaLiga NFT Fantasy Soccer Games Coming to North America
entry.summary: Spanish soccer league LaLiga has tapped gaming startup GameOn to develop fantasy games built around NFTs for the U.S. and Canada.

entry.title: Bull Bitcoin Exchange Expands From Canada to Costa Rica
entry.summary: The company announced that it will tap into Costa Rica's widely used payment infrastructure SINPE Movil for Bitcoin swaps.

entry.title: From Princess Peach to Pikachu: 6 Biggest Reveals From Nintendo Direct
entry.summary: The Nintendo Direct stream offered fans a look at loads of upcoming Switch games. Here's a look at the biggest announcements and trailers.

entry.title: Binance US Legal and Risk Heads Step Down Amid Exec Exodus
entry.summary: The latest departures include legal head Krishna Juvvadi and Chief Risk Officer Sidney Majalya, according to a report from WSJ.

entry.title: Aliens in Mexico's Congress: Earth-Shattering Revelation or Another Hoax?
entry.summary: It's not the first time supposed alien mummies were rolled out into a legislative building in Latin America—and by the same "ufologist."

entry.title: Joy Division NFT Includes Previously Unheard Ian Curtis Audio
entry.summary: Joy Division drummer Stephen Morris and "Unknown Pleasures" artist Peter Saville created the upcoming audiovisual project from Pace Verso.

entry.title: Crypto Exchange Updates Marketing and Fees After Hong Kong Regulator Warning
entry.summary: Hong Kong requires crypto firms to register with its securities regulator. According to SFC, JPEX never applied for a license.

entry.title: Bitcoin Jumps as European Central Bank Signals End to Rate Hikes
entry.summary: The central bank said Thursday its current interest rate level may reign in inflation if "maintained" for long enough.

entry.title: Sam Bankman-Fried’s Father Attended Meetings on FTX Token Marketing and Tax Issues
entry.summary: Sam Bankman-Fried’s father did more than appear in a commercial for FTX with comedian Larry David, per Bloomberg.

entry.title: Amboss Wants to Solve the Bitcoin Lightning Network Liquidity Problem
entry.summary: “Without liquidity, payments simply aren't possible,” Amboss CEO Jesse Shrader told Decrypt.

entry.title: Deutsche Bank To Offer Crypto Custody With Swiss Fintech Taurus
entry.summary: The bank will establish digital asset custody and tokenization services, in a sign that "institutional interest is building," said Taurus.

entry.title: 3AC’s Su Zhu, Kyle Davies Slapped With 9-Year Finance Ban by Singapore Monetary Authority
entry.summary: The company hired a hedge fund manager without notifying authorities and then traded crypto with no risk framework in place.

entry.title: Coinbase CEO: DeFi Projects Should Take Regulators to Court to ‘Establish Precedent’
entry.summary: Brian Armstrong argued that the CFTC shouldn't be taking action against DeFi protocols, and that the courts would likely "uphold rule of law."

entry.title: 'Like Star Wars Collectibles': SEC Commissioners Dissent on Stoner Cats Enforcement
entry.summary: Two SEC commissioners dissented on the regulator’s action against the Stoner Cats NFT series, likening them to 1970s Star Wars collectibles.

entry.title: Ralph Lauren, Burberry Alum Launches Digital Fashion Platform SYKY
entry.summary: The platform, which will offer both digital and physical fashion items, seeks to coax the traditional fashion industry onto the blockchain.

entry.title: Diesel Debuts Digital Apparel for Meta Avatars With DressX
entry.summary: Fashion brand Diesel joins the likes of Valentino and Balenciaga in dropping digital clothes on the Meta Avatars Store.

entry.title: Proposed California Legislation Would Protect Actors From AI Copycats
entry.summary: Assemblymember Ash Kalra's bill targets vague contracts that exploit an actor's digital likeness without clear consent or representation.

entry.title: No Bubble Here: Goldman Sachs Says AI Still in Early Stages
entry.summary: Goldman Sachs foresees a promising future for AI investments, debunking bubble theories and projecting a bullish market.

entry.title: Game Developers Are 'Fucking Livid' Over Unity's New Fees
entry.summary: The popular game engine's new fees have left some developers feeling stuck, although Unity is trying to explain its way out of the unrest.

entry.title: 5 Up-and-Coming Generative Artists to Keep Your Eye On
entry.summary: The generative art world is thriving, and exciting new artists keep emerging all the time. Here are a few that you should know.

entry.title: You Can't Beat the Real Thing? AI Is Making Coca-Cola Flavors Now
entry.summary: Don’t call it New Coke. Global beverage giant Coca-Cola offers a glimpse of the future with a new flavor co-created with AI.

entry.title: It Wasn't PayPal—Paxos Fat Fingered $510,000 Bitcoin Transaction
entry.summary: Paxos is now working with the lucky miner who received the fee to get its money back.

entry.title: Pedophile Rings Are Using AI to Create Child Pornography, UK Group Warns
entry.summary: The IWF says AI-generated child sexual abuse material is being spread on the dark web, complicating law enforcement efforts.

entry.title: What Happens to Mila Kunis' Stoner Cats NFTs After SEC Settlement?
entry.summary: Questions remain as to the fate of the star-studded NFT animated series which was slapped with an SEC action Wednesday. Here's what we know.

entry.title: FTX Gets Court Approval to Sell Billions in Bitcoin, Ethereum and Solana
entry.summary: The collapsed exchange's new management now can sell billions of dollars in Solana, Bitcoin and other assets.

entry.title: Stoner Cats NFT Sales Surge After SEC Reveals Charges
entry.summary: Enforcement action against the Mila Kunis-led cartoon series Stoner Cats has apparently led to a jump in NFT sales and prices alike.

entry.title: How Mino Games is Using Artificial Intelligence
entry.summary: Mino Games CEO Sasha McKinnon tells Decrypt's Kate Irwin about how the studio's upcoming game Dimensionals will use real-time AI.

entry.title: INTERVIEW: How Will Aurory Use NFTs and Crypto?
entry.summary: Michael Natoli, Aurory's Head of Marketing and Business Development, tells Decrypt's Jason Nelson about how the Aurory games will use NFTs and crypto and shares the studio's broader stance on the tech.

entry.title: Google Cloud's James Tromans on the Intersection of AI and Web3
entry.summary: Google's Global Head of Google Cloud for Web3 James Tromans sat down with Decrypt's Jason Nelson to discuss how AI can help Web3 companies come to market faster and the real value of Web3 tools.

entry.title: Mastering NFT Trading - Degen U
entry.summary: Take Degen U's new course, Mastering NFT Trading, and earn an on-chain certificate. A top instructor will help you identify trends, seize the right moment to trade, weed out scams—and have fun while doing it!

entry.title: Space Nation CEO on Working With 'Independence Day' Director Roland Emmerich
entry.summary: Jerome Wu, CEO of Space Nation, tells Decrypt's Kate Irwin about the upcoming Space Nation Online game in development and shares details on Space Nation Cofounder Roland Emmerich's role in the project.

entry.title: GAME REVIEW: Champions Arena from Gala Games
entry.summary: Champions Arena is a turn-based fantasy RPG from Gala Games, where characters can become NFTs and crypto can be used to purchase gems, one of the game's synthetic currencies. Decrypt's Kate Irwin takes us inside the game for her thoughts on the fun, mobile-first title.

entry.title: Apex Legends Voice Actor Ben Prendergast on the Future of Gaming
entry.summary: Voice actor Ben Prendergast, who's voiced characters in games like Apex Legends and God of War Ragnarok, shares his opinions on the tech space's history of "bubbles" and whether blockchain gaming has a future.

entry.title: The Future of AI Stardom and Robotics With SingularityNET COO Janet Adams and Desdemona
entry.summary: In this interview, SingularityNET COO Janet Adams explains the intricate details that went into creating the Desdemona robot AI from Hanson Robotics and future plans for the AI Diva.

entry.title: Crypto a 'No-Brainer' for Video Games, Says Mino Games CEO
entry.summary: Mino Games CEO Sasha MacKinnon, developer of the upcoming Dimensionals game, tells Decrypt's Kate Irwin about the studio's approach to digital collectibles.

entry.title: Michael Wagner's 'Controversial Take' on Crypto in Games
entry.summary: At Solana's PlayGG, Star Atlas CEO Michael Wagner shares his "controversial take" on crypto in games, shares the challenges of developing the upcoming scifi game, and how crypto's volatility has changed his perspective with Decrypt's Jason Nelson.

entry.title: Interview: Angelic CEO on Building the Sci-Fi RPG on Solana and Ethereum
entry.summary: Angelic is a sci-fi roleplay game in development that will be free-to-play and offer optional, opt-in crypto features on Solana and Ethereum and a governance token. Metaverse Game Studios CEO and Founder Erkan Bayol tells Decrypt's Jason Nelson about how he sees AAA traditional games as Angelic's main competitors and shares his vision for the game.
